DOC.brief_summary: The line `` 5-hour Energy '' ® product available over-the-counter energy supplement . The appeal product involve ease use , low caloric value , absence sugar prevent `` crash '' later day . The definitive efficacy potency product unknown due lack evidence-based clinical report . It suspect efficacy related product due caffeine content , report 138 mg per 2-ounce bottle online caffeine content chart . The purpose randomized , double-blind , placebo control , four way crossover study evaluate efficacy `` 5-hour Energy '' ® , `` 5-Hour Energy Decaf '' ® , caffeine , placebo perceive energy wakefulness .

DOC.criteria: Subjects must age 18 year old consume five caffeinated beverage product per day . One caffeinated beverage define follow : six ounce cold hot coffee tea , twelve ounce soda caffeine , one energy drink .
